name: Zombie Block Land Crush
description:
In Zombie Block Land Crush the rules are simple - escape the zombie horde or have your brain eaten. Are you up for the challenge? Shoot the zombies ahead with your impressive arsenal of weapons and witness true ragdoll-packed gore galore!
Features:
- Many challenges to complete: checkpoint hunt, path finding, boss fight and much more!
- Find hidden treasure chests scattered around the world
- Awesome power-ups to use to your advantage
- Various zombie types to fight
- Fun driving simulator model
